translation.en: We sold a little bit of a dream that my family had more money, um, than they actually did.
translation.it: Abbiamo fatto credere che avessi più soldi di quanti ne avessi.

translation.en: What's interesting is here's a kid who doesn't need money.
translation.it: Al ragazzo non servono i soldi.

translation.en: He comes from oil money.
translation.it: È di buona famiglia.

translation.en: A kid who came from oil money.
translation.it: Lavorano nel settore petrolifero.

translation.en: We're not doing anything criminal.
translation.it: Non era un reato.

translation.en: We're just not abiding by the NCAA bylaws on which you're not allowed to make money.
translation.it: Avevamo solo infranto le regole della NCAA.

translation.en: Well, Johnny Football suspended for half a game.
translation.it: Johnny Football sospeso per metà partita.

translation.en: The NCAA says there is no evidence that Manziel took money,
translation.it: L'NCAA dice che non ci sono prove che abbia preso dei soldi,

translation.en: but he still violated the rules by signing certain photographs.
translation.it: ma che ha comunque violato le regole firmando delle fotografie.

translation.en: They, um, penalized him half a game
translation.it: Lo hanno penalizzato di mezza partita

translation.en: for failure to prevent the commercialization of his name.
translation.it: per aver commercializzato il suo nome.

translation.en: And we went right back to signing autographs.
translation.it: E siamo tornati a firmare autografi.

translation.en: The last time the reigning Heisman Trophy winner returned to play in the SEC
translation.it: L'ultimo vincitore dell'Heisman Trophy a giocare in SEC

translation.en: was Tim Tebow back in 2007.
translation.it: è stato Tim Tebow nel 2007.

translation.en: Now, it's this man's turn.
translation.it: Ora tocca a Manziel.

translation.en: [presenter] The one person that everybody had their eyes on earlier this morning
translation.it: L'unico giocatore che tutti aspettavano, stamane,

translation.en: was Johnny Football.
translation.it: era Johnny Football.

translation.en: Once he won the Heisman,
translation.it: Quando ha vinto l'Heisman,

translation.en: I saw a different side of him.
translation.it: ho visto un lato diverso di lui.

translation.en: It was like there was nothing stopping him from doing what he wanted to do.
translation.it: Niente gli impediva di fare ciò che voleva, a quel punto.

translation.en: [Johnny] What was going on with the NCAA,
translation.it: Quello che succedeva all'NCAA,

translation.en: for years and years and years, was just wrong,
translation.it: da anni e anni, era sbagliato,

translation.en: and I went into that suspension pissed,
translation.it: e la sospensione mi ha fatto incazzare,

translation.en: but also with the biggest smirk on my face ever.
translation.it: ma ho sfoderato un sorrisetto sornione, perché non avevo sbagliato.

translation.en: And then, from then on out, everything I really did
translation.it: Ma da quel momento in poi,

translation.en: just got absolutely nitpicked and torn apart.
translation.it: hanno cominciato a prendermi di mira.

translation.en: People saying, "He's traveling around the world,
translation.it: "Se ne va in giro per il mondo,

translation.en: he's done Jay Leno, he hasn't been at practice very much."
translation.it: è andato da Jay Leno, non si allena."

translation.en: Fuck your practice. I'm the best player in the country.
translation.it: Fanculo gli allenamenti. Sono il migliore.

translation.en: [presenter] Manziel caught a lot of heat from the media after leaving the Manning Passing Academy.
translation.it: Manziel criticato dai media dopo la Manning Passing Academy.

translation.en: Some reports say Manziel was hungover and missed camp.
translation.it: Salta gli allenamenti dopo una sbronza.

translation.en: [journalist] What happened on the weekend?
translation.it: Cos'è successo nel weekend?

translation.en: Um, nothing… nothing more than I overslept.
translation.it: Ho dormito troppo.

translation.en: I was a shark in a fish tank,
translation.it: Mi sentivo un pesce in un acquario,

translation.en: and I didn't really feel like I had any way to move.
translation.it: mi sentivo in trappola.

translation.en: [presenter] Early Sunday morning, Manziel posted a quote,
translation.it: Domenica, Manziel ha postato: "Cazzate come queste mi fanno venir voglia di andarmene da College station."

translation.en: [woman] Manziel was reportedly quickly and harshly removed from a frat party.
translation.it: Manziel è stato rimosso improvvisamente da una confraternita.

translation.en: [Johnny] I like to have fun in my life.
translation.it: Mi piace divertirmi.

translation.en: I like to live my life to the fullest, and if that upsets some people, I'm sorry.
translation.it: E se questo dà fastidio a qualcuno, mi dispiace.

translation.en: What Johnny needed was to be held accountable.
translation.it: Johnny doveva responsabilizzarsi.

translation.en: When you turn your son over to a coach and to a program,
translation.it: Quando affidi tuo figlio a un allenatore,

translation.en: they're supposed to not only teach him how to play football,
translation.it: non deve solo insegnargli a giocare a football.

translation.en: they're responsible to turn him into a good young man.
translation.it: Il college ha il compito di farne un bravo ragazzo.

translation.en: [Kliff] I always felt you had to be careful
translation.it: Non ho mai voluto dirgli

translation.en: on trying to tell Johnny how to live his life.
translation.it: come doveva vivere la sua vita.

translation.en: Wasn't ideal I think, for us as coaches,
translation.it: Sì, non ero un allenatore perfetto,

translation.en: but it was kinda like, that's the dark side he needed to play good,
translation.it: ma il suo lato oscuro lo aiutava a giocare bene,

translation.en: and as long as he wasn't getting in trouble, um,
translation.it: e finché non si metteva nei guai,

translation.en: do your deal.
translation.it: lo lasciavo fare.

translation.en: [Kevin] Um, nobody's really ever been in this situation.
translation.it: Nessuno si è mai trovato in questa situazione.

translation.en: We've been very clear with Johnny and his family about the dos and don'ts,
translation.it: Abbiamo spiegato a Johnny e alla famiglia cosa può e non può fare,

translation.en: but, um, there's not a perfect person in this room.
translation.it: ma chi non ha mai fatto degli errori, alzi la mano.

translation.en: [Paul] For the school, how do you take him out and waste a season?
translation.it: La scuola non poteva espellerlo e perdere una stagione

translation.en: How do you do that, financially or anything else?
translation.it: perché avrebbe subito delle perdite ingenti.

translation.en: Y… You don't.
translation.it: E non lo espellevano.

translation.en: [presenter] So the suspension
translation.it: La sospensione,

translation.en: that many around college football felt was just a joke is now history,
translation.it: che in molti pensavano fosse solo uno scherzo, è acqua passata

translation.en: and Johnny Manziel is a college football player again.
translation.it: e Johnny Manziel è tornato a giocare.

translation.en: [crowd cheering] Johnny! Johnny! Johnny! Johnny!
translation.it: Johnny!

translation.en: [commentator] In for his first snap of 2013.
translation.it: Il suo primo snap del 2013.

translation.en: And Manziel takes off.
translation.it: Manziel va all'attacco.

translation.en: There goes Johnny Football!
translation.it: Ecco Johnny Football!

translation.en: That's why they love him here in College Station.
translation.it: Ecco perché tutti lo amano a College Station.

translation.en: Here's his other standard move after a touchdown.
translation.it: Il gesto iconico dopo ogni touchdown.

translation.en: All this money thing that he started doing,
translation.it: Il gesto dei soldi che faceva

translation.en: I didn't like it, but people begged for that.
translation.it: non mi piaceva, ma il pubblico lo adorava.

translation.en: [woman shouting] Show me the money, baby!
translation.it: Fammi vedere i soldi, baby!

translation.en: [presenter] This season started with enormous expectations for Johnny Manziel.
translation.it: Grandi aspettative su Johnny Manziel in questa stagione.

translation.en: Perhaps his second Heisman Trophy, SEC National Championship.
translation.it: Forse un secondo Trofeo Heisman e il campionato SEC.

translation.en: [commentator] Third of the half for Johnny Football.
translation.it: Terzo touchdown per Johnny Football.

translation.en: Following the touchdown, unsportsmanlike conduct,
translation.it: Dopo il touchdown, condotta antisportiva

translation.en: No 2 of the offense, 15-yard penalty…
translation.it: per il numero due, 15 yard di penalità…

translation.en: There were people trying to put discipline on me.
translation.it: C'era gente che cercava di disciplinarmi.

translation.en: [Kevin] That's not okay, and obviously, I addressed that
translation.it: Non va bene, e ovviamente l'ho richiamato

translation.en: on the sideline right after the play.
translation.it: a bordo campo dopo l'azione.

translation.en: nobody knew how to handle everything that was going on.
translation.it: Ma nessuno sapeva gestire la situazione.

translation.en: There is a code of conduct for the reigning Heisman winner,
translation.it: C'è un codice di condotta per il detentore dell'Heisman,

translation.en: and he violated it once again.
translation.it: e lui l'ha violato di nuovo.

translation.en: He's hanging out with Drake and LeBron, and he's coming home…
translation.it: Se ne andava in giro con Drake e LeBron

translation.en: You think he cared what came out of me and Paul's mouth?
translation.it: e non ascoltava né me né il padre.

translation.en: At that point, you were like… Didn't matter.
translation.it: A quel punto ho lasciato perdere.

translation.en: [man] This guy's been partying since he stepped into College Station,
translation.it: Va alle feste da quando è a College Station,

translation.en: so I think he's just being himself.
translation.it: è solo se stesso.

translation.en: [woman] Can college football take three more years of Johnny Football?
translation.it: Il college football resisterà altri tre anni a Johnny Football?

translation.en: [commentator] Say whatever you want about Johnny Manziel,
translation.it: Dite quello che vi pare su Johnny Manziel,

translation.en: if you can watch one player in college football, you wanna watch him.
translation.it: ma è lui il giocatore del college che venite a vedere.

translation.en: [Johnny] I'm getting approached by agents knowing if I come back out this year,
translation.it: Gli agenti sapevano che se fossi tornato l'anno dopo

translation.en: and I recreate even a smidgen of that success,
translation.it: con i risultati dell'anno in corso,

translation.en: I'm gonna have millions of dollars and be the first quarterback taken in the draft.
translation.it: sarei stato il primo quarterback scelto nella draft.

translation.en: [presenter] Biggest question involving the former Heisman winner
translation.it: La domanda è se deve diventare un professionista,

translation.en: is whether he should head to the pros
translation.it: La domanda è se deve diventare un professionista, ora che ha acquisito un simile valore.

translation.en: while his draft stock is looking so bright.
translation.it: ora che ha acquisito un simile valore.

translation.en: [Johnny] I bitched out on workouts and felt like I didn't have to do what everybody else was doing,
translation.it: Ho saltato gli allenamenti, sentivo di potermelo permettere,

translation.en: and that whole idea and mantra I had in my head from Kerrville of,
translation.it: e il mantra che avevo in testa a Kerrville:

translation.en: "You're gonna dress the same way, do the same thing as the guy next to you,"
translation.it: "Ti comporterai sempre come un ragazzo qualunque"

translation.en: was completely eliminated in six months' time.
translation.it: svanì nel giro di sei mesi.

translation.en: [commentator] Got a feeling Johnny Manziel's a little frustrated.
translation.it: Johnny Manziel sembra un po' frustrato.

translation.en: [Paul] I think all of the expectation, the partying, the NCAA stuff,
translation.it: Penso che le aspettative, le feste, la storia dell'NCAA, la pressione a cui era sottoposto,

translation.en: all the A&M, all the pressure,
translation.it: la storia dell'NCAA, la pressione a cui era sottoposto,

translation.en: I think it changed him.
translation.it: l'avessero cambiato.

translation.en: [commentator] There's a reaction on the sidelines from A&M's leader, Johnny Manziel.
translation.it: Reazione a bordo campo del leader dell'A&M Johnny Manziel.

translation.en: [Kevin] The thing that makes him who he is, is his passion and emotion.
translation.it: Ciò che lo rende ciò che è sono la sua passione e le sue emozioni.

translation.en: It's our challenge to try to keep that energy positive.
translation.it: La nostra sfida è mantenere quell'energia positiva.

translation.en: [presenter] Johnny Manziel just can't help himself.
translation.it: Johnny Manziel non resiste.

translation.en: You draw the line in the sand, he steps over that line.
translation.it: Se tracciavi una linea nella sabbia, lui la scavalcava.

translation.en: [man] Let's remember this. This problem did not happen last year.
translation.it: Questo problema non si è verificato l'anno scorso.

translation.en: [shouting] Turn the fuck up!
translation.it: Alza il volume!

translation.en: Last week was one of his most disappointing games since he's been at Texas A&M.
translation.it: La scorsa settimana ha fatto una delle partite più deludenti.

translation.en: [presenter] And the ovation for Johnny Manziel
translation.it: L'ovazione per Johnny Manziel

translation.en: along with these seniors as they close the door on Kyle Field.
translation.it: che insieme ai senior, chiude la stagione a Kyle Field.

translation.en: [Johnny] There's no reason the team we had should be eight and four that year.
translation.it: Abbiamo realizzato otto vittorie quell'anno.

translation.en: We were better than that.
translation.it: Meritavamo di meglio.

translation.en: But it didn't matter
translation.it: Ma non importava,

translation.en: 'cause you're looking at mock drafts and you're looking forward and…
translation.it: perché i pronostici ci infondevano fiducia.

translation.en: whether people like to say it or not, I was bigger than College Station.
translation.it: Che alla gente piacesse o no, meritavo di meglio di College Station.

translation.en: So it was just kinda time to move on and go do the next thing.
translation.it: Era ora di andare avanti e fare la prossima mossa.

translation.en: Johnny Manziel made it official today, no surprise,
translation.it: Manziel oggi ha annunciato

translation.en: announcing he's gonna leave college to enter the NFL draft.
translation.it: che lascerà il college per entrare nell'NFL Draft.

translation.en: [presenter] The big question, "Where will Manziel go in the draft?"
translation.it: Il grande interrogativo è... con che numero giocherà?

translation.en: I think I was considered a very risky person, um, for him
translation.it: Pensavano fossi un rischio per lui,

translation.en: 'cause I knew everything.
translation.it: perché sapevo tutto.

translation.en: And so I think that the counsel he was receiving at the time
translation.it: E credo che il consiglio che gli diedero all'epoca

translation.en: was probably sound advice, which is like,
translation.it: fosse un consiglio valido,

translation.en: "Hey, you're no longer doing this half-ass, 20-year-old management."
translation.it: quello di non comportarsi come se fosse ancora un adolescente.

translation.en: I… I just knew I was super loyal,
translation.it: Sapevo di essere super leale,

translation.en: and that I contributed everything, mind, body, soul, spirit, to help him,
translation.it: che ho sempre cercato di aiutarlo con tutto me stesso

translation.en: erm, and an image needed to change from being best friend
translation.it: e che la mia immagine doveva evolversi da migliore amico

translation.en: to it needed to be a big firm.
translation.it: a quella di manager di un'azienda.

translation.en: [Johnny] We'd originally told him that there wasn't gonna be a guy with me in the day-to-day,
translation.it: Gli abbiamo detto che non mi serviva qualcuno accanto 24 ore su 24,

translation.en: and when we told him that wasn't gonna happen,
translation.it: che non sarebbe più stato necessario,

translation.en: I kinda think, like, he felt his role and the whole role was diminished,
translation.it: e credo che lui l'abbia presa male, sentendosi sminuito,

translation.en: and kinda pulled away.
translation.it: e si è allontanato.

translation.en: [inhales] And I don't think we've spoken again since then.
translation.it: E da allora non ci siamo più parlati.

translation.en: You know, for me, this is what we'd talked about flying on those planes to South Beach.
translation.it: Ripensavo a cosa ci eravamo detti sugli aerei per South Beach.

translation.en: You know, this is what we talked about at the Fontainebleau sitting by the pool.
translation.it: A cosa ci eravamo detti a bordo piscina, al Fontainebleau.

translation.en: So, you know, I felt terrible about it, but at the same time,
translation.it: Mi sentivo malissimo, ma allo stesso tempo sapevo,

translation.en: because of what my track record was, they weren't gonna allow me to do that.
translation.it: che, dati i miei precedenti, non me l'avrebbero più permesso.

translation.en: And Nate being away was probably a safeguard for a while.
translation.it: E l'assenza di Nate è stata una salvezza per un po'.

translation.en: [Nate] I didn't care about the business side of it.
translation.it: Non mi importava dei soldi.

translation.en: Truly, I didn't.
translation.it: Davvero, no.

translation.en: The only thing I was hurting about was that I loved Johnny.
translation.it: Mi mancava solo il mio amico Johnny.

translation.en: He was my best friend.
translation.it: Era il mio migliore amico.

translation.en: I was, um… unbelievably loyal to my guys.
translation.it: Sono stato incredibilmente leale con i miei amici.

translation.en: U… Until you really can't be anymore.
translation.it: Finché non puoi più esserlo.

translation.en: Yeah, I'm Erik Burkhardt.
translation.it: Sì, sono Erik Burkhardt.

translation.en: Um, I was Johnny's sports agent for way too many years.
translation.it: Sono stato l'agente di Johnny per molti, troppi anni.

translation.en: So it's such a big deal,
translation.it: E sono gatte da pelare,

translation.en: especially for a quarterback, if they can go in the first round,
translation.it: perché un quarterback scelto al primo round, fra i primi cinque,

translation.en: because if he goes top five, we're talking 20 to 25 million.
translation.it: perché un quarterback scelto al primo round, fra i primi cinque, vale dai 20 ai 25 milioni.

translation.en: And every pick in the first round, the money starts falloff about a million dollars.
translation.it: A ogni successiva scelta nel Draft NFL, si scende di un milione.

translation.en: So many people had been making millions of dollars
translation.it: Tanta gente aveva fatto milioni di dollari

translation.en: on the back of Johnny and his teammates, largely after that Heisman year.
translation.it: dopo il trofeo Heisman, grazie a Johnny e ai suoi compagni.

translation.en: He earned this contract, which was still gonna be peanuts
translation.it: Meritava quel contratto, quei soldi,

translation.en: compared to what so many other people had made on his back the whole time.
translation.it: erano nulla in confronto a quelli di chi mangiava alle sue spalle.

translation.en: I was real. I didn't come in saying, "You're gonna go top ten."
translation.it: Gli ho detto: "Sarai fra i primi 10.

translation.en: I came and I go, "You're not going in the first round."
translation.it: Non sarai scelto al primo round".

translation.en: He does not belong in the top 25.
translation.it: Non appartiene alla top 25.

translation.en: He may get a bump to second round. He's not getting in the first round.
translation.it: È una seconda scelta, non una prima scelta.

translation.en: The big questions on Johnny were gonna be, "Do you really wanna be a quarterback,
translation.it: Tutti gli chiedevano: "Vuoi essere un quarterback

translation.en: or do you wanna be famous?" 'Cause he was super famous already.
translation.it: o vuoi essere famoso?" Perché era già super famoso.

translation.en: There's things Johnny's gotta answer moving forward
translation.it: Deve rispondere a queste domande

translation.en: to be a quarterback and be a leader.
translation.it: per essere un quarterback e un leader.

translation.en: We can leave no doubt. For somebody to take your fucked-up ass in the first round,
translation.it: Bisogna avere una strategia

translation.en: here's what this strategy needs to look like.
translation.it: per farsi scegliere al primo round.

translation.en: [Johnny] I'm going straight to San Diego and I'm getting right into this pre-draft training.
translation.it: Vado dritto a San Diego, all'allenamento preliminare.

translation.en: Come right back.
translation.it: Ora torna.

translation.en: [Erik] So, number one: We're doing no PR.
translation.it: Zero comunicazioni ai media.

translation.en: The only thing coming outta your socials is you sweating and working your ass off.
translation.it: L'unica cosa che devi mostrare sui social è che ti fai il culo.

translation.en: You need to gain some weight, learn the game, no drinking,
translation.it: Devi ingrassare, capire il gioco, niente alcol

translation.en: and when you show up at the NFL Combine in two months,
translation.it: e quando andrai all'NFL Combine, fra due mesi,

translation.en: now they're really gonna start considering you.
translation.it: cominceranno a considerarti.

translation.en: You know, 6:30, 7:00 in the morning until seven, eight o'clock at night,
translation.it: Mi svegliavo alle 7 di mattina e mi allenavo fino alle 7 di sera,

translation.en: and you just do it on repeat over and over and over again.
translation.it: tutti i giorni.

translation.en: [Erik] We're gonna go crazy and do a record-setting Nike deal through LeBron's team,
translation.it: Firmeremo un contratto con Nike, con LeBron,

translation.en: but we're gonna do those in silence.
translation.it: ma lo faremo in silenzio.

translation.en: I was drug testing him every other week
translation.it: Lo sottoponevo ai test antidroga

translation.en: 'cause I know that's gonna come up, and I wanna be able to go, "Here's 25 drug tests. I've been testing him."
translation.it: a settimane alterne, per poter dire: "È pulito, gli ho fatto 25 test".

translation.en: "'Cause when I signed him, I didn't know what I was dealing with,
translation.it: Mi ha ingaggiato, e il mio compito,

translation.en: but I wanted you to have peace of mind."
translation.it: era garantire coerenza.

translation.en: You need to own who you were and what you've done.
translation.it: Doveva riconoscere gli errori del passato.

translation.en: I was like, "We're gonna embrace who you were
translation.it: Non si rinnega il passato,

translation.en: and say, 'Okay, but now it's time to go be a pro, and I'm gonna grow up.'"
translation.it: ma intanto, doveva crescere come atleta e come uomo.

translation.en: And that was my expectation that he actually would.
translation.it: E mi aspettavo che lo facesse davvero.

translation.en: I was really, really good until the week before the combine in Indy,
translation.it: Sono stato bravo fino alla settimana prima della Combine, a Indy,

translation.en: and I finally just broke.
translation.it: ma, alla fine, ho ceduto.

translation.en: He calls me, and he's like,
translation.it: Mi chiama e mi dice:

translation.en: "EB, I fucked up."
translation.it: "EB, ho fatto una cazzata".

translation.en: [tsks] Like, "How bad?"
translation.it: "Cioè?", gli chiedo.

translation.en: I didn't remember much of the night.
translation.it: Non ricordavo niente.

translation.en: I woke up in a hotel room, and didn't know how I got there.
translation.it: Non sapevo com'ero finito in quell'hotel.

translation.en: "Dude, I went to a party last night in the Hills."
translation.it: "Sono andato a una festa stanotte.

translation.en: He's like, "Man, everyone was there. Man, all the rappers, all the actresses."
translation.it: C'erano tutti. I rapper, le attrici."

translation.en: I mean, I didn't know, going into Indy, if I was really gonna be able
translation.it: Non sapevo più se avrei passato il test antidroga.

translation.en: to pass a drug test.
translation.it: se avrei passato il test antidroga.

translation.en: He's clean the whole time before that.
translation.it: Proprio la notte prima!

translation.en: The only thing I've ever been told was, "Fail a drug test at the combine,
translation.it: Se non avessi superato il test antidroga,

translation.en: and you're gonna go from first-round pick to maybe undrafted."
translation.it: sarei stato escluso dalla selezione.

translation.en: They're gonna drug test you day two here.
translation.it: Ti faranno il test antidroga.

translation.en: He's like, "EB, I've been watching the NFL combine."
translation.it: E lui: "Ho guardato la NFL Combine".

translation.en: "I'm coming to the combine."
translation.it: "Sono pronto a farmi testare."

translation.en: I say, "No, you're not." There… We're not risking this, so we compromise.
translation.it: "No, non lo sei, non ce la rischiamo", gli dico.

translation.en: I call Paul and Michelle. I'm like, "Okay,
translation.it: Chiamo Paul e Michelle.

translation.en: you are checking yourself in the hospital, Paul, with, like, fucking heavy heart,
translation.it: Paul era in ospedale per un check up al cuore.

translation.en: so that Johnny can divert and come to the combine for 12 hours,
translation.it: Johnny ha una scusa per andare da lui, e guadagnare 12 ore

translation.en: so that it doesn't look weird,
translation.it: senza destare sospetti,

translation.en: and put him on a plane down to see Dad who's in the hospital."
translation.it: perché sta andando da papà in ospedale.

translation.en: "I'm so sorry, but we'll reschedule these interviews."
translation.it: "Mi dispiace, interviste rimandate."

translation.en: That was my strategy, and Paul's like, "Okay, Michelle, you're going,"
translation.it: Questo era il mio piano, Paul e Michelle lo appoggiarono.

translation.en: and, like, she's crying, "I knew he would do this."
translation.it: Michelle piange: "Sapevo che avrebbe fatto una bravata".

translation.en: I'm like, "Fuck."
translation.it: Dico: "Merda".

translation.en: He's like, "I don't even get there till tomorrow, bro."
translation.it: Lui riesce ad arrivare il giorno dopo.

translation.en: "I'm gonna chug a gallon of fucking water. "I'll piss this shit out. Trust me."
translation.it: Mi dice: "Mi bevo litri e litri di acqua e piscio tutto, fidati".

translation.en: He goes, "I… I've been passing these tests at A&M for a while,"
translation.it: "Ho passato tutti i test dell'A&M", dice.

translation.en: which I come to find out on my own
translation.it: Poi scopro

translation.en: it was their, like, fourth-string backup quarterback -that was pissing for him at A&M. -[smirks]
translation.it: che usava le urine dei quarterback di riserva, all'A&M!

translation.en: -So how's the day been? -It's been really good.
translation.it: - Com'è andata oggi? - Bene.

translation.en: A little early morning, but we're kinda in the mood now, in the swing of things.
translation.it: Ci siamo alzati presto, ma siamo pimpanti.

translation.en: I get, like, three gallons of water, a bunch of Pedialyte,
translation.it: Prendo quattro litri d'acqua, bibite con elettroliti

translation.en: and four drug tests.
translation.it: e quattro test antidroga.

translation.en: There's, like, six hotels at the combine. So every team's, like, staying at these same hotels.
translation.it: C'erano sei hotel alla Combine. I team alloggiavano tutti lì.

translation.en: We get on the elevator, and up… Comes on.
translation.it: Entriamo nell'ascensore e arrivano due manager

translation.en: Two general managers and a college scouting director get on the elevator.
translation.it: Entriamo nell'ascensore e arrivano due manager e un direttore scouting.

translation.en: I'm holding the drug tests, like, trying to hide them.
translation.it: Io nascondo i test antidroga.

translation.en: We go to my room.
translation.it: Andiamo in camera mia.

translation.en: We're, like, holding his piss up in the bathroom of my hotel room,
translation.it: Osserviamo la sua pipì nel bagno della mia camera,

translation.en: and it's, like… it's a little ambiguous.
translation.it: e non sappiamo cosa pensare.

translation.en: Johnny's just crushing liquids.
translation.it: Johnny continua a bere.

translation.en: We take our second one. It's a little lighter.
translation.it: Al secondo test, l'urina è meno carica.

translation.en: So he's like, "Ha ha ha! We got this shit."
translation.it: Lui dice: "Ce la faremo".

translation.en: I was like, "Keep drinking."
translation.it: Gli dico: "Continua a bere".

translation.en: What was that process like?
translation.it: Com'è stato?

translation.en: It was really cool to see… to see a bunch of these coaches I've seen on TV and…
translation.it: È stato bello vedere gli allenatori che vedevo in TV.

translation.en: By the way, he of course crushed his interviews.
translation.it: Ha rilasciato delle ottime interviste.

translation.en: In fact, rave reviews out of the combine on how great he did.
translation.it: Si era destreggiato bene alla Combine, conquistando tutti.

translation.en: And that was a very, very, um, scary thing,
translation.it: E la cosa mi spaventava molto.

translation.en: one that I think snapped me out of it for a little bit,
translation.it: Ci ho messo un po' a superare quella paura

translation.en: and then once I got through that unscathed, um…
translation.it: e poi, una volta superata la paura...

translation.en: you know, kinda let loose a little bit more.
translation.it: si impara a lasciarsi andare.

translation.en: [presenter] It was a pro day done the Johnny Manziel way.
translation.it: Johnny si sta comportando da vero professionista.

translation.en: [Erik] The next step is pro day where he's gonna do the on-the-field.
translation.it: Vedremo come se la caverà sul campo.

translation.en: I go to multiple pro days every year, there will never be another like this.
translation.it: È stato un Pro-day come non ne avevo mai visti.

translation.en: [presenter] A huge crowd at College Station. George and Barbara Bush even showing up.
translation.it: Gran folla a College Station. C'erano anche George e Barbara Bush.

translation.en: Manziel's performance receiving universal praise.
translation.it: Grande performance di Manziel.

translation.en: Our strategy's working. The buzz is like, "He could go."
translation.it: La nostra strategia funzionava. Credevano in lui.

translation.en: [woman] Most experts agree he's gonna be a top-ten pick.
translation.it: Gli esperti dicono che sarà tra i primi dieci.

translation.en: [man] He'll be a top-ten pick.
translation.it: Sarà tra i primi dieci.

translation.en: At that point, our strategy was just throw his ass in a cave, lock him up.
translation.it: A quel punto dovevo solo buttarlo in una caverna e chiuderlo lì.

translation.en: After I got through my pro day, I felt like a majority of the work had been done.
translation.it: Dopo il Pro-Day, il grosso del lavoro era stato fatto.

translation.en: Will the Houston Texans pick Johnny Manziel first?
translation.it: Gli Houston Texans sceglieranno Johnny Manziel?

translation.en: Houston, number-one pick.
translation.it: Houston, scelta numero uno.

translation.en: The buzz is building in the city.
translation.it: Tutti parlavano di lui.

translation.en: [presenter] All around Houston, billboards are up to bring Johnny Football back to Texas.
translation.it: Houston vuole tenere Johnny Football in Texas.

translation.en: He got involved with a big charity foundation event.
translation.it: Va alla festa di un'organizzazione di beneficenza.

translation.en: The owner was gonna be there with his wife.
translation.it: C'erano il proprietario e la moglie.

translation.en: Johnny ends up, like, donating his own money to the cause.
translation.it: Johnny finisce per donare i suoi soldi alla causa.

translation.en: It goes phenomenal.
translation.it: Successone.

translation.en: The next day, I get a call.
translation.it: Il giorno dopo, ricevo una chiamata.

translation.en: "He was golfing today at River Oaks Country Club,"
translation.it: "Stava giocando al River Oaks Country Club"

translation.en: and it got back to the owner's family, basically, that Johnny, by hole five,
translation.it: e alla buca cinque, il proprietario del club mi riferisce

translation.en: had taken his shirt off, "looked intoxicated,"
translation.it: che si era tolto la camicia, che era ubriaco,

translation.en: and broke multiple clubs over his knee and threw 'em in the pond.
translation.it: e che aveva rotto varie mazze, buttandole nello stagno.

translation.en: There goes Houston.
translation.it: Addio, Houston.

translation.en: It's Weekend at Bernie's. It's just like, how can we get him to the finish line?
translation.it: Portarlo al traguardo finale sarebbe stata un'impresa.

translation.en: The wheels are coming off. I'm talking to him every day.
translation.it: Parlavo con la madre tutti i giorni.

translation.en: "Stay accountable. You've worked your whole life. We got one month to go."
translation.it: Gli diceva di resistere un altro mese.

translation.en: People are talking first pick overall or a top ten.
translation.it: La gente parla di prima scelta o di una top ten.

translation.en: The story that just sums up the whole thing,
translation.it: La storia che riassume tutto...

translation.en: the night before his private workout with the Browns… [Erik] They all fly in.
translation.it: La sera prima del suo allenamento con i Browns, loro arrivano in aereo.

translation.en: They're gonna do dinner with him in College Station
translation.it: Avrebbero cenato a College Station con lui

translation.en: with a private workout the next morning.
translation.it: e si sarebbero allenati il giorno dopo.

translation.en: Dinner goes awesome.
translation.it: La cena va alla grande.

translation.en: So we go up to our rooms… [Billy] I miss about five calls from him.
translation.it: Torniamo alle nostre stanze, ho cinque chiamate perse da lui.

translation.en: I go over there, and it's a shit show.
translation.it: Vado da lui e c'è il delirio in camera sua.

translation.en: Bottles of 1942 everywhere.
translation.it: Bottiglie di tequila dappertutto.

translation.en: He's drinking straight outta the wine bottles.
translation.it: Beve direttamente dalle bottiglie di vino.

translation.en: So the next day, one of the receivers is missing.
translation.it: Il giorno dopo, uno dei ricevitori è scomparso.

translation.en: This other receiver's drunk, can't get up.
translation.it: L'altro è ubriaco, non si è alzato.

translation.en: So the Browns walk in the facility, he's warming up,
translation.it: I Browns entrano in campo, lui si sta scaldando,

translation.en: they look over, they're like, "Where's the receivers?"
translation.it: si guardano intorno, mancano i ricevitori.

translation.en: And Johnny goes, "Ah, we're good."
translation.it: Johnny dice: "È tutto a posto".

translation.en: You know who catches passes for him? His lawyer,
translation.it: Sapete chi prende i pass per lui? Il suo avvocato.

translation.en: his agent…
translation.it: Il suo agente...

translation.en: The first route, it's like, "Okay, let's run a slant." I'm like…
translation.it: Dicono: "Facciamo una slant". E io...

translation.en: Like I'm in high school, bros. This is ridiculous.
translation.it: Come al liceo. Che situazione ridicola.

translation.en: I call him, like, "How'd it go?"
translation.it: Lo chiamo. "Com'è andata?"

translation.en: He said, "I fucking killed it."
translation.it: Mi dice: "Ho spaccato".

translation.en: [broadcaster] Welcome indeed to New York City, to Radio City Music Hall
translation.it: Benvenuti a New York, al Radio City Music Hall,

translation.en: where, tonight, we find out where Johnny Manziel will be playing…
translation.it: dove scopriremo dove giocherà Johnny Manziel…

translation.en: There's cameras in our face around our table the entire time.
translation.it: Ci puntavano le telecamere in faccia, ovunque.

translation.en: From the minute we walk in, it's like the Johnny Manziel Show.
translation.it: Il Johnny Manziel show era iniziato.

translation.en: "Where's he going?" And we have no idea.
translation.it: Non sapevo dove sarebbe finito.

translation.en: With the first pick in the 2014 NFL draft,
translation.it: Con la prima scelta dell'NFL Draft 2014,

translation.en: the Houston Texans select Jadeveon Clowney.
translation.it: gli Houston Texans scelgono Jadeveon Clowney.

translation.en: [Erik] Then you had the Jacksonville Jaguars at three.
translation.it: I Jacksonville Jaguars avevano la terza scelta.

translation.en: I had on good authority. They were ready to take a franchise quarterback.
translation.it: Sapevo che volevano un quarterback di livello.

translation.en: The Jacksonville Jaguars select Blake Bortles.
translation.it: I Jacksonville Jaguars scelgono Blake Bortles.

translation.en: [broadcaster] The first quarterback of this draft selected is not Johnny Manziel.
translation.it: Il primo quarterback selezionato non è Johnny Manziel.

translation.en: Bortles goes three, and Johnny's like, "Fuck, yes! I'm going to Dallas."
translation.it: Johnny dice: "Mi prenderà il Dallas".

translation.en: [broadcaster] What happens when Jerry Jones gets the chance to take Johnny Football?
translation.it: Jerry Jones prenderà Johnny Football?

translation.en: [Johnny] I really thought the floor would probably be Dallas at 16.
translation.it: Pensavo che, alla peggio, mi avrebbero preso a Dallas.

translation.en: They wait the whole clock.
translation.it: Decidono con calma.

translation.en: [broadcaster] If they take Johnny Manziel right now, this place is gonna explode.
translation.it: Se dovessero prendere Johnny Manziel, questo posto esploderà.

translation.en: The Dallas Cowboys select
translation.it: I Dallas Cowboys scelgono

translation.en: Zack Martin, guard, Notre Dame.
translation.it: Zack Martin, guardia, Notre Dame.

translation.en: We're sitting at the draft table, and he's just going down the draft.
translation.it: Lui sta per sprofondare nella sedia a quel punto.

translation.en: A lot of teams did their homework.
translation.it: Se l'erano pensata.

translation.en: [broadcaster] Snubbed by team after team after team after team.
translation.it: Snobbato da una squadra dopo l'altra.

translation.en: [Johnny] I was nervous about it. You can see it on my face on draft night.
translation.it: Ero nervoso. Mi si leggeva in faccia.

translation.en: I think you can see it in a lot of people around me.
translation.it: Eravamo tutti nervosi.

translation.en: Like, if I don't get picked in the first round, I'll probably disappear, run off the face of the earth.
translation.it: Dico: "Se non vengo scelto al primo round, sparisco dal pianeta".

translation.en: And I remember being horrified. Like, my career's on the line right now too.
translation.it: Ero terrorizzato, perché era in ballo anche la mia carriera.

translation.en: So at that point, I'm, like, texting Cleveland, "Come back in, bro. Trust me."
translation.it: A quel punto ho chiesto ai Cleveland di prenderselo.

translation.en: -Browns at 26 just moved up to 22. -[crowd] Johnny!
translation.it: - I Browns sono saliti da 22 a 26. - Johnny!

translation.en: And you can hear the chant in the Radio City Music Hall for Johnny.
translation.it: La folla inneggia per Johnny al Radio City Music Hall.

translation.en: With the 22nd pick,
translation.it: Con la 22esima scelta,

translation.en: the Cleveland Browns select
translation.it: I Cleveland Browns scelgono

translation.en: [broadcaster] My goodness.
translation.it: Santo cielo.

translation.en: [Erik] That moment was unbelievable.
translation.it: È stato incredibile.

translation.en: [broadcaster] Right there, is the hope for the city of Cleveland.
translation.it: Quell'uomo è una speranza per la città di Cleveland.

translation.en: [Erik] As down as it felt… It felt like we were in there for three days.
translation.it: Ci è sembrato di essere seduti lì da tre giorni.

translation.en: He walks across that stage, and does the Money Manziel.
translation.it: Lui, sul palco, fa il suo gesto, il Money Manziel.

translation.en: [Erik] Holy shit.
translation.it: Porca vacca.

translation.en: He went in the first round.
translation.it: Preso, al primo round.

translation.en: It all works out.
translation.it: È andato tutto bene.

translation.en: [broadcaster] The Browns finally get the face of their franchise.
translation.it: I Browns hanno finalmente il nuovo volto della loro squadra.

translation.en: [Erik] I was like, "We're gonna make it."
translation.it: "Ce la faremo", dicevo.

translation.en: "He's gonna be the savior. They're gonna build statues of this guy."
translation.it: "Li salverà, erigeranno statue in suo onore."

translation.en: And then, I'll never forget, we leave the draft,
translation.it: Andiamo via dall'NFL Draft in limousine,

translation.en: we're at this light and the sunroof's open and Johnny's like, crushing shots of whatever in this limo with his family and friends,
translation.it: tettuccio aperto, al semaforo Johnny beve e festeggia con amici e famiglia.

translation.en: and we look up
translation.it: Guardiamo in alto

translation.en: and it was the first Nike ad on the side of this building in New York,
translation.it: e c'era il cartellone della Nike con la sua faccia,

translation.en: and I was like, "Wow."
translation.it: e io penso "Wow".

translation.en: "Let's go."
translation.it: "È fatta."

translation.en: [woman] Well, the news is Johnny Manziel is having a ripple effect across Browns Nation.
translation.it: La notizia dell'acquisizione sta avendo un effetto a cascata su Browns Nation.

translation.en: -[people shouting] Johnny! -[man] Whoa!
translation.it: Johnny!

translation.en: [Johnny] You know, the people around me that I had, um, were genuinely very, very excited.
translation.it: Le persone del mio entourage erano contente per me.

translation.en: You know, they thought this was a great opportunity for me to come in
translation.it: Perché era l'opportunità giusta per rivitalizzare

translation.en: and to revitalize a franchise that had been struggling for a long time.
translation.it: un franchising che era in difficoltà da tempo.

translation.en: You know, every day that passes, every week that goes by is… is only a positive thing for me.
translation.it: Il mio entusiasmo cresce giorno dopo giorno, settimana dopo settimana.

translation.en: There was so much pressure on him and expectations,
translation.it: C'era così tanta pressione su di lui, così tante aspettative

translation.en: and you could tell he was struggling.
translation.it: che si vedeva che era in difficoltà.

translation.en: [Johnny] Didn't take me very long to be in Cleveland
translation.it: Non ci ho messo molto a capire

translation.en: to find out that I wasn't gonna be happy there.
translation.it: che non sarei stato felice a Cleveland.

translation.en: I had every single thing that I could've ever wanted.
translation.it: Avevo tutto ciò che desideravo.

translation.en: You have money, you have fame,
translation.it: Avevo soldi, fama,

translation.en: you're a first-round draft pick battling for a starting quarterback position,
translation.it: avevo ottenuto un ruolo di quaterback da professionista,

translation.en: and when I got everything that I wanted,
translation.it: avevo tutto ciò che desideravo da sempre,

translation.en: I think I was the most empty that I've ever felt inside.
translation.it: eppure non mi ero mai sentito così vuoto.

translation.en: [Johnny] You know, I'd always had a great time in the locker room with my guys
translation.it: Mi sono sempre divertito negli spogliatoi con i miei ragazzi,

translation.en: and the practice and the camaraderie and everything that comes along with it,
translation.it: durante gli allenamenti, mi mancava il cameratismo dell'A&M.

translation.en: but I never felt that way in the NFL.
translation.it: Non l'ho mai avuto nell'NFL.

translation.en: What it takes to be the face of franchise each and every day,
translation.it: Era diventato il nuovo volto di un franchise,

translation.en: that's just not who he is, and he never put that much into it.
translation.it: Era diventato il nuovo volto di un franchise, ma non gli interessava.

translation.en: If he wanted to do it, his skill set and how good he is as a player,
translation.it: Se avesse voluto essere un franchise, con la sua bravura,

translation.en: he could've done it. He never worked at it.
translation.it: avrebbe già potuto esserlo.

translation.en: [Erik] I started seeing signs pretty early on in Cleveland.
translation.it: Ho captato i primi segnali della sua insoddisfazione.

translation.en: The one thing for me was he always loved the game,
translation.it: Lui si divertiva un sacco in campo,

translation.en: and he'd call me after practice, like, "I don't… Man, it's not fun anymore."
translation.it: ma ora diceva che non si divertiva più.

translation.en: Their GM's calling me going, "He doesn't watch tape."
translation.it: Il presidente mi dice: "Non guarda le vecchie partite".

translation.en: I'm like, "Well, he's gotta watch some tape."
translation.it: "Qualcuna la guarderà", dico.

translation.en: He's like, "EB, his iPad hours is 0.00."
translation.it: Il presidente dice che il suo iPad ha 0 ore di utilizzo.

translation.en: I would sit in my condo in Cleveland downtown
translation.it: Nel mio appartamento in centro, a Cleveland,

translation.en: and just feel like it was the only place that I could get away from everybody and anything.
translation.it: mi sentivo nell'unico posto dove potevo isolarmi da tutto e tutti.

translation.en: And I would look out those windows every day and I just felt empty.
translation.it: Guardavo fuori da quelle finestre e mi sentivo vuoto.

translation.en: I went from one fishbowl city to another, and I wanted nothing to do with football.
translation.it: Mi sentivo un pesce in una boccia di vetro e il football non mi interessava più.

translation.en: I wanted nothing to do with stepping on that field.
translation.it: Non volevo avere niente a che fare con quel campo.

translation.en: And I had bigger issues in my life
translation.it: C'erano problemi più grossi

translation.en: than being able to go out and play free-spirited, flowing football.
translation.it: che il non poter giocare un football libero e creativo.

translation.en: I had gone from the whirlwind ride of 2012 in College Station,
translation.it: Ero passato dalla corsa vorticosa del 2012 a College Station

translation.en: the Heisman Trophy, the Cotton Bowl, the NCAA investigation,
translation.it: all'Heisman Trophy, al Cotton Bowl, all'inchiesta dell'NCAA

translation.en: straight into another season, into the NFL draft.
translation.it: e a un'altra stagione nell'NFL Draft.

translation.en: I just didn't get a break.
translation.it: Senza fermarmi mai.

translation.en: [Johnny] It's been life for so long now.
translation.it: Quella era stata la mia vita.

translation.en: I can't really think back to the days of how it was
translation.it: Non riesco a ripensare a com'era un tempo,

translation.en: when I didn't have people tweeting or taking pictures of wherever I was.
translation.it: quando la gente non mi fotografava ovunque andassi.

translation.en: [Johnny] I truly almost see those times in black and white.
translation.it: Vedo quei tempi in bianco e nero.

translation.en: And I didn't know why I couldn't see sunny days.
translation.it: E non capivo perché avevo perso l'ottimismo.

translation.en: [commentator] …Manziel, and Manziel is buried.
translation.it: ...Manziel è morto e sepolto.

translation.en: And there's your first cash sign.
translation.it: Ecco la mossa dei soldi.

translation.en: This thing of the, you know, show me the money.
translation.it: Questo gesto del "mostrami i soldi".

translation.en: Every time they sack him, the defensemen do that right in his face.
translation.it: Ogni volta che lo placcano, i difensori glielo fanno in faccia.

translation.en: He had a terrible start in the NFL.
translation.it: Un inizio terribile nella NFL.

translation.en: [presenter] It was horrific…
translation.it: È stato orribile.

translation.en: [presenter 1] Nothing like the Johnny Football we saw at Texas A&M.
translation.it: Non sembra lo stesso Johnny Football del Texas A&M.

translation.en: I'm supposed to be the savior. [inhales] You know, I'm just looking for a good day.
translation.it: Avrei dovuto salvarli, ma volevo solo tornare a sorridere.

translation.en: In the back of my head all the time,
translation.it: Tra me e me pensavo continuamente:

translation.en: I was telling myself, "You do not wanna fuckin' be here."
translation.it: "Tu non ci vuoi stare qui, cazzo.

translation.en: And "Do what you need to do to get out."
translation.it: Fai di tutto per andartene".

translation.en: [presenter] Stories surfaced about him being late for team meetings.
translation.it: Arriva tardi alle riunioni di squadra.

translation.en: He was demoted to third-string quarterback.
translation.it: È stato retrocesso a quarterback di riserva.

translation.en: A high-price, first-round draft pick heading in the wrong direction.
translation.it: Prima scelta del Draft NFL, ci è costato, ma si è perso.

translation.en: Yeah, I…
translation.it: Sì, io…

translation.en: You know, I made the decision to go out on Friday night.
translation.it: Ho deciso di uscire venerdì sera.

translation.en: I think I was trying to suppress how I felt,
translation.it: Volevo distrarmi, dimenticare come mi sentivo

translation.en: and get out of being Johnny Football.
translation.it: e uscire dal personaggio Johnny Football.

translation.en: When he turned pro, the partying became more public.
translation.it: Le sue feste erano diventate di dominio pubblico.

translation.en: -I can't hear. -He can't hear you.
translation.it: - Non sento. - Non ti sente.

translation.en: There's too much money… in my… hand.
translation.it: Ho troppi soldi in mano.

translation.en: Nothing that I'm doing on the weekends is affecting my job.
translation.it: Le feste non compromettono il mio lavoro.

translation.en: Nothing on the weekends that I'm doing, um, is hopefully hurting any of my teammates in my locker room.
translation.it: E spero non infastidiscano i miei compagni di squadra.

translation.en: [Paul] So he kinda just said, "Fuck it. I just got $8.5 million,
translation.it: Mandò a fanculo tutto. "Ho appena ricevuto 8,5 milioni di dollari,

translation.en: so I'll just go do what I want."
translation.it: e ora ci faccio quello che voglio."

translation.en: People around me always told me, like, "You're doing this on purpose."
translation.it: Chi mi conosceva, mi diceva che lo stavo facendo apposta.

translation.en: Now, in my conscious mind, that didn't make sense to me.
translation.it: Per me non aveva senso.

translation.en: He just keeps putting himself in situations where he's getting himself in trouble.
translation.it: Si ficca sempre in situazioni in cui si mette nei guai.

translation.en: That guy knows that he represents more than himself and has issues off the field.
translation.it: Sa che rappresenta molto più di se stesso e ha problemi fuori dal campo.

translation.en: It's… It is frustrating.
translation.it: È frustrante.

translation.en: I wanted to get him help. We all knew he was self-destructing.
translation.it: Volevo aiutarlo. Sapevamo che si stava autodistruggendo.

translation.en: [Erik] It was like he stopped caring.
translation.it: Era come se non gli importasse più.

translation.en: And I was like, "Okay, we gotta do rehab."
translation.it: A quel punto decido di farlo disintossicare.

translation.en: [female presenter] Johnny Football, the big bust of a rookie last year,
translation.it: Johnny Football, il novellino che ha fallito,

translation.en: entered a treatment program on Wednesday.
translation.it: è in una clinica a disintossicarsi.

translation.en: It was hard the first couple days,
translation.it: I primi giorni è stata dura,

translation.en: obviously being a guy that's on every single TV.
translation.it: perché questa storia finì su ogni TV del Paese.

translation.en: He's been somewhat of a legend, and perhaps to his own peril here.
translation.it: È stato una leggenda, ma forse a sue spese.

translation.en: [Johnny] I did have people trying to figure out which treatment center I was at,
translation.it: C'era gente che voleva scoprire in quale centro mi trovassi.

translation.en: and I remember walking down the hill one day
translation.it: Mentre passeggiavo giù per la collina

translation.en: and seeing this rental car drive right past us,
translation.it: un giorno vedo un'auto che ci supera,

translation.en: and it was Jeremy Fowler from ESPN, and I just…
translation.it: ed era Jeremy Fowler dell'ESPN, e la cosa…

translation.en: It threw me for a loop whenever that happened.
translation.it: mi mandò in confusione.

translation.en: [female presenter] When he returned to the team after ten weeks of rehab,
translation.it: Quando tornò in squadra, dopo dieci settimane,

translation.en: he looked and sounded like a changed man.
translation.it: sembrava un uomo diverso.

translation.en: I'm gonna say "Loser in life." Can't get out of it.
translation.it: È un perdente. Dai, non riesce a venirne fuori.

translation.en: The hype and everything is a little bit tempered and a little down,
translation.it: Il battage mediatico si è smorzato

translation.en: and that, for me, is a good thing.
translation.it: e per me è solo un bene.

translation.en: Got out of rehab. He was doing awesome. He was focused.
translation.it: Dopo il centro di riabilitazione, stava bene.

translation.en: He started playing, and you could just gradually see,
translation.it: Ha ripreso a giocare, ma vedevo che piano piano,

translation.en: once he started being around other influences, here we go again.
translation.it: tornava a essere il ragazzo irresponsabile di un tempo.

translation.en: When you take one step onto a slippery slope,
translation.it: Quando ti trovi su un pendio scosceso,

translation.en: you know, it goes pretty quick.
translation.it: vai veloce, molto veloce.

translation.en: Remember, he went to rehab, not supposed to drink.
translation.it: Si è disintossicato. Non dovrebbe bere.

translation.en: Drank, got into a fight with his girlfriend.
translation.it: Litiga furiosamente con la ragazza.

translation.en: [broadcaster] Both Manziel and the woman told police they had been drinking.
translation.it: Manziel e la donna hanno ammesso di aver bevuto.

translation.en: No charges were filed.
translation.it: Nessuno ha sporto denuncia.

translation.en: And after that, it started to spiral a little bit more and more and more.
translation.it: Dopo quell'incidente, la situazione mi è sfuggita di mano.

translation.en: I thought I would go to Vegas on a Saturday afternoon
translation.it: Pensavo di andare a Las Vegas il sabato pomeriggio

translation.en: and I would turn around and come back and be in time for the game the next day.
translation.it: e di tornare in tempo per la partita del giorno dopo.

translation.en: [presenter] It sounded a little cuckoo,
translation.it: Sembrava assurdo,

translation.en: but he had the wig on, there was a fake mustache involved.
translation.it: ma indossava la parrucca e dei baffi finti.

translation.en: [Johnny] I sit down at a blackjack table,
translation.it: Sono a un tavolo di blackjack,

translation.en: and I can start to see people, you know, looking at me a little bit.
translation.it: e vedo che la gente mi nota e mi guarda.

translation.en: This is when the Twitter shitstorm absolutely hits the fan.
translation.it: E a quel punto cominciano a sputtanarmi su Twitter.

translation.en: I don't know anything about getting a plane to leave Vegas
translation.it: Non sapevo come prenotare il volo per Cleveland.

translation.en: to go back to Cleveland. I'm looking at commercial flights.
translation.it: Ho cercato dei voli commerciali.

translation.en: I missed the last one at 10:30, and at this point, I'm like,
translation.it: Perdo l'ultimo volo, alle 10:30,

translation.en: "Well, let's fucking rip it tonight."
translation.it: e a quel punto mi dico: "Torno alla festa".

translation.en: I completely detached from all of it.
translation.it: Non mi fregava più niente di niente.

translation.en: Johnny Football is now looking for another team this morning.
translation.it: Johnny Football cerca un'altra squadra.

translation.en: The Cleveland Browns cutting ties with Johnny Manziel and his bad-boy behavior.
translation.it: I Cleveland Browns tagliano i ponti con il ragazzaccio Johnny Manziel.

translation.en: [presenter] There is no future for Johnny Manziel with the Cleveland Browns,
translation.it: Non c'è futuro per Johnny Manziel con i Cleveland Browns,

translation.en: certainly not anymore, as the Browns have finally realized.
translation.it: e i Browns lo hanno finalmente capito.

translation.en: Manziel is not reachable.
translation.it: Manziel non è raggiungibile.

translation.en: [Paul] It was just…
translation.it: È stato...

translation.en: It was disastrous. It was… It was the fall.
translation.it: un disastro. L'inizio del declino.

translation.en: [presenter] One of the biggest busts in NFL history.
translation.it: Uno dei più grandi fallimenti della storia della NFL.

translation.en: "Tiny," "selfish," "undisciplined," "immature," "sort of a brat."
translation.it: "Irrilevante", egoista", "indisciplinato", "immaturo", "un moccioso".

translation.en: [presenter 1] Johnny Manziel arrived as the future of Cleveland football,
translation.it: Avrebbe dovuto essere il futuro del football di Cleveland.

translation.en: and now he will soon leave as an embarrassment.
translation.it: Invece è stato un incidente imbarazzante.

translation.en: [Johnny] When I got cut from the Browns,
translation.it: Quando i Browns mi hanno ceduto,

translation.en: I felt like the biggest weight lifted off my shoulders ever.
translation.it: mi sono sentito liberato di un gran peso.

translation.en: But that didn't translate into what I experienced
translation.it: Ma poi questo non mi ha aiutato a stare meglio

translation.en: and what I… [inhales deeply] …would deal with in my everyday life.
translation.it: e ad affrontare diversamente la mia vita, giorno per giorno.

translation.en: [news reporter] Dallas police say they are examining hotel surveillance video
translation.it: La polizia sta esaminando i video delle telecamere dell'hotel

translation.en: showing an encounter between Manziel and his ex-girlfriend, Colleen Crowley.
translation.it: che mostrano un incontro tra Manziel e la sua ex, Colleen Crowley.

translation.en: Crowley said Manziel led her down a back stairway,
translation.it: Manziel l'ha trascinata giù per le scale

translation.en: and that she told the valet,
translation.it: e lei ha chiesto al parcheggiatore

translation.en: "Please don't let him take me. I'm scared for my life."
translation.it: di non lasciarla sola con lui perché era pericoloso.

translation.en: [Johnny] Throughout that relationship, I was unfaithful
translation.it: L'avevo tradita varie volte durante la nostra relazione,

translation.en: and, you know, we get into a heated, heated argument.
translation.it: e la discussione era degenerata.

translation.en: You know, she's trying to jump out of the car, and, um…
translation.it: Lei ha cercato di saltare giù dall'auto e…

translation.en: Colleen Crowley has obtained a protective order from a judge in Texas
translation.it: Colleen Crowley ottiene un ordine di protezione da un giudice del Texas

translation.en: that will keep Johnny Manziel away from her for two years.
translation.it: che terrà Johnny Manziel lontano da lei per due anni.

translation.en: It was so out of control,
translation.it: Era fuori controllo, era perso,

translation.en: but he couldn't hear it.
translation.it: ma non riusciva a capirlo.

translation.en: His mind was so gone. I mean, he was just…
translation.it: Aveva perso la testa. Cioè, era…

translation.en: Did you apologize for what happened?
translation.it: Ti sei scusato per quello che è successo?

translation.en: What about rehab, Johnny? Gonna go to rehab?
translation.it: Andrai in riabilitazione?

translation.en: We tried to get him in another rehab. Took him, you… you know.
translation.it: Decidiamo di mandarlo in un altro centro. Ce lo portiamo.

translation.en: He escapes.
translation.it: Lui scappa.

translation.en: [man] Friends and family are concerned. Everything going well?
translation.it: Amici e parenti sono preoccupati. Tutto bene?

translation.en: My friends and family are all right. They're with me.
translation.it: Gli amici e la famiglia mi stanno vicino.

translation.en: [Paul] My relationship with Johnny was very strained.
translation.it: Il mio rapporto con Johnny era molto teso in quel periodo.

translation.en: "I've done everything I can for ya. You're not listening."
translation.it: Gli dicevo: "Non mi ascolti.

translation.en: "You're self-destructing. You're disrespectful."
translation.it: Ti stai autodistruggendo. Non hai rispetto."

translation.en: Pretty much "Go fuck yourself. Go… You know more than I do, so go ahead."
translation.it: E lui mi rispondeva: "Fanculo. Pensi di sapere tutto tu".

translation.en: [female presenter] His dad says Manziel refused rehab twice in the past week.
translation.it: Suo padre dice che Manziel ha rifiutato la riabilitazione due volte.

translation.en: I said, "If you miss one counseling session, I will have to literally terminate you,"
translation.it: Gli dico che se salta un'altra sessione di counseling,

translation.en: which doesn't happen in agent business, much less to Johnny Football.
translation.it: lo abbandono, e non succedeva spesso in quel mondo.

translation.en: [female presenter] Even his agent, Erik Burkhardt, is dumping Manziel.
translation.it: Anche il suo agente, Erik Burkhardt, sta scaricando Manziel.

translation.en: [Johnny] I got released as a client of my uncle, who was doing my attorney work.
translation.it: Mio zio era il mio avvocato e mi abbandonò,

translation.en: My dad withdrew his name from my company,
translation.it: mio padre ritirò il suo nome dalla mia azienda,

translation.en: and the people around me, closest to me,
translation.it: e le persone a me più vicine

translation.en: were in the mindset of, "We have to let him go."
translation.it: mi abbandonarono a me stesso.

translation.en: And, you know, when that happened,
translation.it: E quando è successo,

translation.en: it was full-blown "I'm gonna rub this whole thing in your fucking face."
translation.it: ho detto: "Ve lo sbatterò in faccia, al momento giusto".

translation.en: "You think you've seen something now? You haven't seen shit yet."
translation.it: "Me la pagherete, tutti quanti, vedrete."

translation.en: [Johnny] You know, the first point in my life where I really ramped up my drug use
translation.it: In quel momento della mia vita il mio consumo di droga

translation.en: to a constant, daily thing.
translation.it: è diventato quotidiano.

translation.en: -[man] Johnny, got anything you wanna say? -[man 1] Johnny Football. How's it going?
translation.it: - Johnny, hai qualcosa da dire? - Come va?

translation.en: [Johnny] I was mostly doing a lot of coke and taking Oxys.
translation.it: Tiravo cocaina e prendevo l'ossicodone.

translation.en: I went from 215 pounds in January to 175 pounds by September.
translation.it: A gennaio pesavo 97 chili e a settembre, 79.

translation.en: The wires in my head seemed very twisted.
translation.it: Avevo perso l'equilibrio emotivo e mentale.

translation.en: I got diagnosed as bipolar,
translation.it: Mi diagnosticarono il disturbo bipolare

translation.en: and I felt like it was the same as being called an alcoholic or a drug addict.
translation.it: che per me era come essere un alcolizzato, un tossico.

translation.en: [presenter] The money and the fame and the criticism and the social media
translation.it: I soldi, la fama, le critiche e i social media,

translation.en: it is eating him alive.
translation.it: lo stanno mangiando vivo.

translation.en: [Johnny] I think I was just running from problems.
translation.it: Stavo solo fuggendo dai problemi.

translation.en: Probably a f… five-million-dollar bender.
translation.it: È stata una sbronza da cinque milioni di dollari.

translation.en: [Johnny] Direct self-sabotage, trying to burn this thing down.
translation.it: Mi auto-sabotavo, volevo cancellare la mia carriera.

translation.en: I had planned to do everything that I wanted to do at that point in my life.
translation.it: Volevo fare tutto quello che mi passava per la testa.

translation.en: Spend as much money as I possibly could, and then my plan was to take my life.
translation.it: Spendere più soldi che potevo e poi uccidermi.

translation.en: [Johnny] You know, I… Months prior, went and bought a gun that I knew I was gonna use.
translation.it: Mesi prima, avevo comprato una pistola e sapevo che l'avrei usata.

translation.en: [Johnny] I wanted it to get as bad as humanly possible to where it made sense,
translation.it: Volevo arrivare a un punto di non ritorno

translation.en: and it made it seem like an excuse and an out for me.
translation.it: in cui il suicidio sarebbe sembrato una liberazione.

translation.en: Still, to this day, I don't know what happened,
translation.it: Ancora oggi, non so cosa sia successo,

translation.en: but the gun just clicked on me.
translation.it: ma la pistola si è inceppata.

translation.en: I couldn't fix what I'd done
translation.it: Non potevo sistemare le cose

translation.en: with Colleen, with the NFL, with A&M, everything.
translation.it: con Colleen, con la NFL, con l'A&M, con tutti.

translation.en: You know, at that point in time, I didn't have much of a relationship with my family.
translation.it: I rapporti con la mia famiglia erano deteriorati.

translation.en: The ride was over.
translation.it: La corsa era terminata.

translation.en: [Johnny] I left LA not knowing where I was gonna go, um,
translation.it: Ho lasciato Los Angeles senza sapere dove sarei andato,

translation.en: not knowing what was gonna happen, and I went back to Texas,
translation.it: e cosa sarebbe successo. Sono tornato in Texas,

translation.en: and, you know, I didn't really say a whole lot to my dad,
translation.it: e non ho detto molto a mio padre.

translation.en: just kinda showed up at the front door
translation.it: Ho bussato a casa dei miei:

translation.en: and pretty much saying, "I don't have anywhere else to turn, man."
translation.it: "Non so a chi altri chiedere aiuto".

translation.en: -[birds chirping] -[Johnny whistles] Come on.
translation.it: Dai.

translation.en: [breathes in] Come here.
translation.it: Vieni qui.

translation.en: -Come here. -[Paul chuckles]
translation.it: Vieni qui.

translation.en: I took him yesterday and he was runnin', runnin' wild on the golf course.
translation.it: Ieri si è scatenato sul campo da golf.

translation.en: -I'll send you a video. -You should take him every day.
translation.it: - Ti ho mandato un video. - Portacelo ancora.

translation.en: He doesn't wanna stay in the house, I know that.
translation.it: Non vuole stare a casa. Lo so.

translation.en: [Paul] It's been a long, long road, and it's been…
translation.it: È stato un percorso lungo e faticoso,

translation.en: I don't know if it's been great
translation.it: e non so se è andato bene

translation.en: or if it's been bad.
translation.it: o se è andato male.

translation.en: That's kinda still up for debate.
translation.it: Dobbiamo ancora capirlo.

translation.en: [Paul] Come up the hill.
translation.it: Su per la collina.

translation.en: [Johnny] All right. I'll drive down the first one.
translation.it: Prendo la prima.

translation.en: [Paul] But we're blessed, and he's still with us.
translation.it: Ma siamo fortunati perché è ancora con noi.

translation.en: [grunts softly] Yeah.
translation.it: Sì.

translation.en: [Paul] And we can mend all the fences still.
translation.it: E possiamo recuperare il nostro rapporto.

translation.en: [Johnny] Hey, you hit one good out of three.
translation.it: Hai fatto un buon tiro su tre.

translation.en: But I think Johnny's got a lot better days coming than what he's had.
translation.it: Ma so che Johnny avrà giorni migliori di quelli che ha avuto.

translation.en: [Meri] A lot of people wonder, you know, why isn't he doing anything?
translation.it: Molti chiedono perché non torna a giocare.

translation.en: He's not in a place mentally
translation.it: Non è mentalmente pronto

translation.en: to go out and do something right now.
translation.it: a esporsi e a mettersi in gioco.

translation.en: I know how much good he can do in this world,
translation.it: So che può regalare tanta gioia al mondo,

translation.en: but I know the struggle he goes through every single day of his life.
translation.it: ma so cosa ha passato e quanto ancora soffra, tutti i giorni.

translation.en: And it's never gonna go away.
translation.it: E quel dolore non se ne andrà mai.

translation.en: [Johnny] I think people do maybe worry about me sometimes,
translation.it: Credo che alcuni si preoccupino per me,

translation.en: but, I mean, that… that's natural.
translation.it: ma è naturale.

translation.en: You know, I've given them reason to do that.
translation.it: Ho dato loro un motivo per farlo.

translation.en: I didn't go into Texas A&M thinking I was gonna play two years
translation.it: Non pensavo che avrei giocato nel Texas A&M per due anni

translation.en: and end up in the NFL draft.
translation.it: e che sarei finito nella NFL Draft.

translation.en: You know, I thought if I ever got to play football in college,
translation.it: Per me, già giocare a football al college

translation.en: that would be an unbelievable accomplishment for me.
translation.it: sarebbe stato un risultato incredibile.

translation.en: And I tell people all the time, it wouldn't have mattered where I was at, um, what team.
translation.it: Dico sempre a tutti che non è stata colpa della squadra.

translation.en: Wherever it was, at that point in time in my life, I was incapable of being a good NFL quarterback.
translation.it: In quel momento, non sarei stato un buon quarterback in nessuna squadra.

translation.en: [Johnny] You know, when you get to that point, you're supposed to fuckin' know better.
translation.it: Quando arrivi a quel livello, dovresti già sapere molte cose.

translation.en: Supposed to know what to do, behave like a pro.
translation.it: Dovresti comportarti da professionista.

translation.en: You're supposed to push your career forward,
translation.it: Dovresti cercare di progredire,

translation.en: your athleticism forward, you know, your strive for being a great athlete.
translation.it: di migliorare e diventare un grande atleta.

translation.en: [Johnny] But when it came down to it, you know, I was a frat boy,
translation.it: Ma in fondo, ero un ragazzo del college,

translation.en: and it's just my frat was the football team.
translation.it: e la mia confraternita era la squadra di football.

translation.en: I loved what I did. I loved the freedom.
translation.it: Mi sono divertito e sentito libero.

translation.en: I loved being the guy
translation.it: Mi è piaciuto fare

translation.en: that got to go do all these amazing things on and off the field.
translation.it: tutte le cose incredibili che ho fatto, dentro e fuori dal campo.

translation.en: You know, but at some point in time, you have to look back
translation.it: Ma a un certo punto ti guardi indietro

translation.en: and think, "Fuck, was enough ever enough?"
translation.it: e pensi: "Niente è mai abbastanza per te".

translation.en: You know, are you ever gonna be satisfied,
translation.it: Sarai mai soddisfatto?

translation.en: or you're just gonna continue living that frat-boy life
translation.it: O continuerai a vivere come uno studente,

translation.en: for year after year after year
translation.it: anno dopo anno dopo anno,

translation.en: until you finally look up, and you're still living it,
translation.it: finché non te ne accorgerai,

translation.en: and it's been detrimental to where you wanted to go in life
translation.it: e capirai che quella vita ti ha tolto tanto,

translation.en: and what you wanted to do.
translation.it: a te, alle tue ambizioni.

translation.en: You know, it's hard for me to sit back and look at these days.
translation.it: È doloroso ripensare a quei giorni.

translation.en: It feels like a distant memory for the most part.
translation.it: Sembrano ricordi di un lontano passato.

translation.en: But, you know, I'm very much on the pursuit of happiness
translation.it: Ma ora cerco la felicità

translation.en: in a way more simplistic form than I was years ago.
translation.it: attraverso uno stile di vita molto più semplice di una volta.

translation.en: I don't really see myself as the… as the Johnny-Football-craze
translation.it: Non mi riconosco nella leggenda di Johnny Football.

translation.en: that's kinda… thatt's kinda swept Aggielands. That swept around the nation a little bit.
translation.it: È una febbre che divampa ad Aggieland e in tutta la nazione.

translation.en: Um, I see myself as Johnny Manziel.
translation.it: Mi vedo come Johnny Manziel,

translation.en: I'm a guy from Kerrville, Texas, who just tried to be a laid-back guy
translation.it: un ragazzo di Kerrville, che vuole tenere i piedi per terra,

translation.en: who likes to hang out with my friends
translation.it: uscire con i suoi amici

translation.en: and be a normal college student just like anybody else.
translation.it: ed essere un normale studente del college.
